name: Into The Abyss (whiestar)
description:
Made for the Meditation project on August 3

At first, I was a little hesitant because it is difficult to talk about depression without sending the wrong message, but I still want to do it because this is a feeling with which I feel closely familiar, both from my own experiences and from a very close friend of mine. 

That's why I tried to show a bit of the courage needed to get rid of all those thoughts that are part of oneself but that lead us more and more to the bottom of the pit. Hope you like it.
